channel.title: 508 Server java compile Support Please!
channel.description:
Okay so i am tryign to set up my 1st ever 508 server
Op windows vista home peroums 64bit ram 3Gb
________________________________________________________________________________________
when i go to compile my server it says this;
Javac: file not found: .\Bulby\io\*.java usage: javax <options> <source files> use -help for a life of possible options Press any key to continue...
______________________________________________________________________________________________
Edit fixed now i just gotta edit client so it says my clients name instead of somthign else if you do want to help me still
i always need help pelase use my msn above
will pay for help paypal only
Now when i run my server a red backing just coems up with laods of text and closes
_____________________________________________________________________________
Yes i have the lastest JDk yes they are in my enviroment verables (dunno if right think so)
i have copied all the folders
bin Bulby cmd lists
into the bin of the java jr folder
Any help be great
Xron25@hotmail.co.uk
